rows.label: qst202910_msg1001
rows.name:
That was a delicious offering,
mo! Sage is happy, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg2001
rows.name:
Thanks to that, my memory
has returned, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg3001
rows.name:
The girl you're looking for went
towards the Pillar City Ruins, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4001
rows.name:
I don't know what she was looking for,
but it's very dangerous for her to be
alone. You should hurry after her, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4002
rows.name:
Please bring me lots and
lots of offerings, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4003
rows.name: Then I might remember something, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202910_msg4004
rows.name:
Stop that, mo! I don't want to be
trapped in the cold again, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4005
rows.name:
Sage will try hard to remember,
so please have mercy, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4007
rows.name: I see, I see...[ML:Dash ] I remember now, mo!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4010
rows.name:
Such tricks have no effect on Sage,
an apprentice Nopon Sage, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4012
rows.name:
If you have time to bully Sage,
please bring me an offering, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4014
rows.name:
You can probably get a Juicy
Ray Fin by defeating a Manda
Moramora in Invidia, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4015
rows.name:
You can get a Benign Cricket in
the Liberalitas Archipelago, and
a Soft Sea Cucumber in Gula, mo.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4016
rows.name: Now, now, go and gather them, mo.
